<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Despair](/Feats.aspx?ID=3531) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 53</row>

**Archetype** [Mummy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=180)

**Prerequisites**
[Mummy's Despair](/Feats.aspx?ID=3524)

</column>

---

You increase the frequency of Mummy's Despair to once per 10 minutes instead of once per hour. A creature that critically fails its Will saving throw is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 1 round instead of [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19). Mummy's Despair gains the [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) trait.
name: Greater Despair
